title: Chaozhou Escape Minutes from Historic Guangji Bridge
description: Crowne Plaza Chaozhou Riverside, an IHG Hotel is located in a city as beautiful as it is brimming with landmarks to visit, with temples and historic monuments peppered throughout the streets of Chaozhou. Admire the nearby pagoda-topped Guangji Bridge and wander for hours exploring and treating your tastebuds to the regional flavours - including the popular Chaozhou gongfu tea. Back at the hotel, enjoy tasty riverside bites at Chao Cuisine Chinese Restaurant.
